description:
Learn basics of how to create modern day websites from our Responsive Web Design - Lite Course!

The mobile web is not going anywhere - it’s only getting bigger…
And, YOU need to be in on the action!

As the mobile web gets bigger than desktop PC and laptop browsing - this is one skill you absolutely need in your bag of tricks!

Mobile websites are not an add-on anymore, they are a necessity. Many websites, frameworks and platforms are taking a “Mobile First” approach.

Optimizing any website for mobile devices can significantly increase traffic and revenue. It is predicted that sometime in the year 2015 mobile internet users will surpass the desktop internet users.

Impress your clients or land a higher paying job or build that dream website with all the cool web technologies.

In this Responsive Web Design – Lite course, you will see how to create fancy sites that work on any browser or device… be it any mobile phone, tablet, browser, desktop or laptop.

The course which is a Lite version is taught over THREE Sessions, spanning over 2 hours of easy to follow Videos with real examples and source code.
title: Responsive Web Design - Lite
